item.text: When David had settled into his palace, he said to Nathan the prophet, “Look, I am living in a palace made from cedar, while the ark of the Lord’s covenant is under a tent.”
Nathan said to David, “You should do whatever you have in mind, for God is with you.”
That night God told Nathan,
“Go, tell my servant David: ‘This is what the Lord says: “You must not build me a house in which to live.

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> I have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> in a <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="03117 0834">time</st> I <st data-num="05927" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> from Egypt<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02088" class="">present</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>. I have <st data-num="01961" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="0168 0413 0168">in a tent</st> that has been <st data-num="04908 0413 04908">in various places</st>.<n id="2" />
Wherever I moved throughout Israel, I did not say to any of the leaders whom I appointed to care for my people Israel, ‘Why have you not built me a house made from cedar?’”’
“So now, say this to my servant David: ‘This is what the Lord of Heaven’s Armies says: “I took you from the pasture and from your work as a shepherd to make you a leader of my people Israel.

I <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you <st data-num="03605 0834">wherever</st> you <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st>, and I <st data-num="03772" class="">defeated</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you. Now I will <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> you as <st data-num="08034" class="">famous</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">as</st> the <st data-num="01419 0834">great men</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.<n id="2" />

I will <st data-num="07760" class="">establish</st> a <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> for my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> and <st data-num="05193" class="">settle</st><n id="1" /> them there; they will <st data-num="07931" class="">live</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">there</st> and <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="07264" class="">disturbed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05750" class="">anymore</st>. <st data-num="05766" class="">Violent</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">men</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01086" class="">oppress</st> them <st data-num="03254" class="">again</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> they did in the <st data-num="07223" class="">beginning</st><n id="3" />

and during the time when I appointed judges to lead my people Israel. I will subdue all your enemies.

“‘“I declare to you that the Lord will build a dynastic house for you!

<st data-num="01961 03588">When</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st> <st data-num="04390" class="">comes</st> for you to <st data-num="01980 05973 01">die</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="06965" class="">raise up</st> your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendant</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834 01961">one</st> of your own <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, to <st data-num="0310" class="">succeed</st> you, and I will <st data-num="03559" class="">establish</st> his <st data-num="04438" class="">kingdom</st>.

<st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> will <st data-num="01129" class="">build</st> me a <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, and I will <st data-num="03559" class="">make</st> his <st data-num="03678" class="">dynasty</st> <st data-num="05704 05769">permanent</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, and <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>. I will <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="05493" class="">withhold</st> my <st data-num="02617" class="">loyal love</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">from</st> him, <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> I <st data-num="05493" class="">withheld</st> it from the one <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">ruled</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you.<n id="1" />

I will <st data-num="05975" class="">put</st> him <st data-num="05975" class="">in</st> <st data-num="05704 05769">permanent</st> <st data-num="05975" class="">charge</st> of my <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> and my <st data-num="04438" class="">kingdom</st>; his <st data-num="03678" class="">dynasty</st> will <st data-num="01961 03559">be</st> <st data-num="05704 05769">permanent</st>.”’”<n id="1" />
Nathan told David all these words that were revealed to him.
King David went in, sat before the Lord, and said: “Who am I, O Lord God, and what is my family, that you should have brought me to this point?
And you did not stop there, O God! You have also spoken about the future of your servant’s family. You have revealed to me what men long to know, O Lord God.

<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">more</st> can <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> <st data-num="03254" class="">say</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you? You have <st data-num="03519" class="">honored</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st>; <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="03045" class="">given</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">special recognition</st>.<n id="2" />
O Lord, for the sake of your servant and according to your will, you have done this great thing in order to reveal your greatness.
O Lord, there is none like you; there is no God besides you! What we heard is true!

And <st data-num="04310" class="">who</st> is like your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, a <st data-num="0259" class="">unique</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nation</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>? <st data-num="0834" class="">Their</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> to <st data-num="06299" class="">claim</st><n id="3" /> a <st data-num="05971" class="">nation</st> for himself! You <st data-num="07760" class="">made</st> a <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> for yourself by doing <st data-num="01420" class="">great</st> and <st data-num="03372" class="">awesome</st> <st data-num="01420 03372">deeds</st><n id="4" /> when you <st data-num="01644" class="">drove out</st><n id="5" /> nations <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you had <st data-num="06299" class="">delivered</st> from the <st data-num="04714" class="">Egyptian</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">empire</st> and its <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>.<n id="6" />
You made Israel your very own nation for all time. You, O Lord, became their God.
So now, O Lord, may the promise you made about your servant and his family become a permanent reality! Do as you promised,
so it may become a reality and you may gain lasting fame, as people say, ‘The Lord of Heaven’s Armies is the God of Israel.’ The dynasty of your servant David will be established before you,

<st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, have <st data-num="01540 0241">revealed</st> to your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> that you will <st data-num="01129" class="">build</st> a <st data-num="01004" class="">dynasty</st><n id="1" /> for him. <st data-num="05921 03651">That is why</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> has <st data-num="04672" class="">had the courage</st> to <st data-num="06419" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">to</st> you.<n id="2" />
Now, O Lord, you are the true God; you have made this good promise to your servant.
Now you are willing to bless your servant’s dynasty so that it may stand permanently before you, for you, O Lord, have blessed it and it will be blessed from now on into the future.”
